name: Rolling Thunder - Gmtk game jam
description:
A litle game about warships, you fight waves of random ai enemies and aftear each round you get an upgrade for your ship.

controls

w / s to acclerate

a / d to turn

q / e to spin camera

f / r to elevate camera

left click to fire

mouse to aim

survive as many rounds as posible, every round your ship will get an upgrade.
